Articles.Content:
Picked up the rendezvous contract yesterday for a new carrier, says bring 2 ships within sight of each other and kill the relative velocity. I have 2 pods within 20m of each other, 0.0m/s relative velocity on a 70.1-70.4 orbit, yet contract is not completed. Am I missing something here?

Also, flying without conics/nodes is damn heroic, feels like Apollo 13'ing every single mission.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-27T05:30:25Z" title="07/27/2015 05:30  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 27, 2015</time> by KennyOMG**
Try opening the Contracts tab and looking at the checklist for your rendezvous contract. Are there any other checkmarks not marked?

Well, this, really.

Also, happy Valentina couldn't be happier to see Jeb.

![kerbal_rendezvous.jpg](http://s12.postimg.org/fknkvyqsc/kerbal_rendezvous.jpg)

eta: I pushed Jeb's pod to higher orbit and lower orbit using Val's engines (can't bet closer than that) but still nothing happened.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-26T22:08:30Z" title="07/26/2015 10:08  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 26, 2015</time> by KennyOMG**
Did the two pods come from the same launch? If I recall correctly it must be two separate vehicles.
Separate launches, both built + launched after I picked up the contract. It was real fun to rendezvous them without nodes/cones.
Did you try switching ships using [ ?
Yes, nothing happens. My main issue is that I'm tight on budget...
Are they both in orbit? Your height is very close to the top of the atmosphere, if one is slightly lower it might be in a suborbital condition stopping the contract from completing.

Val: 70,400-71,468

Jeb: 70,396-71,480

Not burning more fuel than required. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I guess worst case I can just try to edit the save file (while peeking around I also discovered that Val grins like a monkey because she's also BadS).
20m or 20km? [] switch becomes available within 2.25km. It shouldn't be "nothing happens"

> 
> Val: 70,400-71,468
> Jeb: 70,396-71,480
> 
> Not burning more fuel than required. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I guess worst case I can just try to edit the save file (while peeking around I also discovered that Val grins like a monkey because she's also BadS).

There's only two other things I can think of to suggest... 1) check the detailed contract view in Mission Control and see if it says anything else; 2) try activating timewarp and see if it merely takes some flight time to detect the rendezvous. Beyond that, yeah, edit the save file.

> 
> 20m or 20km? [] switch becomes available within 2.25km. It shouldn't be "nothing happens"

...I assume KennyOMG means "I switch vessels, but the contract is unaffected".

DeMatt is correct in his assumption, nothing happened when I switched between the 2 pods, when I let them orbit forever (except of course they slowly drifted apart), etc. No matter what, it just didn't complete.

In the end I edited the save, set the contract to completed, added the funds+sci+rep manually and called it a day.
